data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 4, Rio Ave's Tarantini misses with an attempt on goal.
Artur Soares Dias awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Rio Ave push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 9, Rio Ave are whistled for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Famalicao in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
In the minute 12, Rio Ave needs to be cautious. Famalicao have an attacking throw-in.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 14, Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Famalicao drives forward and Fernando Valenzuela gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 18, Famalicao pushes forward through Ruben Lameiras, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruben Lameiras scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 22, Joaquin Pereyra with an assist there.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 28, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Famalicao.
Rio Ave's Chico Geraldes is on target but unsuccessful.
Rio Ave will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Famalicao.
In the minute 33, In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao attack through Fernando Valenzuela. The finish is off target, however.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 35, Chico Geraldes (Rio Ave) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rio Ave advance rapidly upfield but Artur Soares Dias blows for offside.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Famalicao's half?
In the minute 38, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gabrielzinho for Rio Ave who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rio Ave are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Rio Ave's Gabrielzinho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 40, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Artur Soares Dias signals a Famalicao throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Artur Soares Dias blows against Famalicao's Leonardo Campana for offside.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave drive upfield and Andre Pereira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Famalicao defender.
In the minute 45, Artur Soares Dias will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
In the minute 45, Artur Soares Dias blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Famalicao, close to Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 46, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gama (Rio Ave) is making a first substitution, with Pele replacing Nelson Monte.
In the minute 46, Gama is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Carlos Mane replacing Tarantini.
Rio Ave make their third substitution with Pedro Amaral replacing Andre Pereira.
Famalicao's Ruben Lameiras gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rio Ave defender.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 47, Famalicao's Jordao has been booked in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Artur Soares Dias awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Leonardo Campana for Famalicao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Artur Soares Dias signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Jordao of Famalicao smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ruben Lameiras of Famalicao smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 56, Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rio Ave's half?
Guga is replacing Joaquin Pereyra for the home team.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leonardo Campana for Famalicao has been booked by Artur Soares Dias and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 57, The home team replace Leonardo Campana with Ruben Del Campo.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Chico Geraldes (Rio Ave) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 60, Artur Soares Dias awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
In the minute 62, Gelson Dala (Rio Ave) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Jordao for Famalicao is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 65, Guga (Famalicao) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Famalicao's area.
In the minute 66, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
In the minute 71, Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Rio Ave.
Diego Lopes is on a sub for Gabrielzinho for Rio Ave.
Rio Ave make their fifth substitution with Ronan Jeronimo replacing Nikola Jambor.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 75, Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Patrick William is on a sub for Calvin Verdonk for Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 76, Artur Soares Dias awards the away team a throw-in.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Aderllan Santos equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 78, Great play from Diego Lopes to set up the goal.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Famalicao pushes forward through Ruben Del Campo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 81, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave push forward at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao and Carlos Mane gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Famalicao defence.
In the minute 82, Famalicao needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
Gil Dias is replacing Ruben Lameiras for the home team.
Jhonata Robert is replacing Fernando Valenzuela for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Gil Dias of Famalicao gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 86, Rio Ave are coming forward and Aderllan Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Artur Soares Dias awards Famalicao a goal kick.
Rio Ave's Ronan Jeronimo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Famalicao needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Carlos Mane (Rio Ave) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Artur Soares Dias signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Important block from the Famalicao defence as Gelson Dala fires in a strike for Rio Ave.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Artur Soares Dias.
Toni Borevkovic (Rio Ave) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Famalicao defenders.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
